description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Title: Marketing Executive – Chuyên viên Marketing
              
              Quantity: 8
              
              Working place: 3rd floor, Phuong Dong Golf Building, Tan My Str., Nam Tu Liem, Hanoi.
              
              Deadline: Prior for candidates apply earlier
              

              JOB DESCRIPTION
              
              1. Trade Mission & Exhibition Promotion:
              
              Organize Korea-Vietnam Business Matching program, Trade Fair, Exhibition in Vietnam, Korea;
              
              Find Vietnam buyer/partner matching with demand of Korean clients
              
              Build Vietnam customer database; Find & support customers in B2B.
              
              2. Marketing Analyst:
              
              Make plan & do market research, market survey & manage consulting projects
              
              Cooperate with sales team to do market pre-research before selling items in Vietnam.
              
              3. Marketing Communication:
              
              Day-to-day contact with all targeted governmental Departments, local media & businesses and potential customers.
              
              4. Other marketing tasks
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              1. Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business and any relevant discipline.
              
              Preferable candidates graduated from universities: FTU, NEU, VNU, TMU, and AOF.
              
              2. Preferable experienced candidates in marketing/ sales/ business/customer cares/ market research
              
              4. Good proficiency in English (both oral & writing)
              
              5. Good communication skill,
              
              6. Good computer skills (internet research skill, word, excel, power point)
              
              7. Good team-work and independent working
              
              8. Passion in marketing activities (trade promotion, market research, consulting, event holding, business connection, contact & customer care)
              
              9. Willing to travel upon job required
              
              10. Preferably for woman
              

              Interview 1:1 in English, candidate send English CV via VietnamWorks
              

              BENEFITS
              
              1. Negotiable salary base on working ability & experience.
              
              Initial salary:
              
              10 million VND/month (non-experience candidate)
              
              12-15 million VND/month (2 years+ experience candidate)
              
              2. Salary review & increase policy: once 6 months
              
              3. Bonus: consider based on project, quarter working result.
              
              4. Working environment:
              
              English, dynamic, experience with South Korea’s culture & business.
              
              Have many chance to get promotion to team leader, supervisor, manager after short-working time.
              
              5. Good welfare caring:
              
              Regular company trip (1-2 times/ year on average),
              
              Many team building, culture activities
              
              Training (soft skills, marketing skill, etc.)
              
              6. Two holidays/ week (Saturday + Sunday)
              
              7. The 12-day annual leave + insurance based on Vietnam labor law
              
              8. The 13th salary bonus: at least 1-2 full month salary
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
